item.title: Northside forum crowd concerned about state revenue
item.dc:creator: Brett Dickerson
item.description:
A forum on the near north side of Oklahoma City Thursday suggested that legislators and the public are not anywhere close to finished providing enough revenue for education and state services. And a senator at the forum said the reason for passing bills to increase teacher pay is because legislators are “scared to death of […]

The post Northside forum crowd concerned about state revenue appeared first on Oklahoma City Free Press.

item.title: House Dems: No cleanup for misconduct at taxpayer expense
item.dc:creator: Brett Dickerson
item.description:
“The taxpaying citizens of the state of Oklahoma should not have to foot the bill for sexual misconduct,” said Oklahoma House Minority Leader Scott Inman Friday. At a Capitol news conference, Inman said the Democratic Caucus was “shocked and appalled” to read news reports earlier in the week about allegations that money had been quietly […]

The post House Dems: No cleanup for misconduct at taxpayer expense appeared first on Oklahoma City Free Press.
